means: （使）疲劳（ tire的过去式和过去分词）

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均有"累的，疲乏的"之意。
means: weary ： 侧重指由于连续不断进行某项活动而造成的疲劳，以致感到厌烦。
tired ： 普通用词，泛指因工作紧张，劳动过度，休息不足等而引起的疲乏。

sentence.Network_en: You must have noticed how tired he sometimes looks.
sentence.Network_cn: 你一定注意到他有时候显得特别疲惫。

sentence.Network_en: I had a busy day and was rather tired.
What we see at Westminster is a tired old ritual.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在威斯敏斯特教堂看到的是一种经年不变的古旧仪式。

jx.jx_en_mean: (humorous)used euphemistically to indicate that someone is drunk

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌曲名称：tired 专辑名称：天下不乱 歌手姓名：许怀欣 发行时间：2010-6-22 发行公司：海韵广告有限公司 专辑语种：国语专辑介绍 许怀欣（RYAN）从美国回来就一直摸索着如何让香港的ROCK MUSIC重新回到曾经的黄金时代。试过几首纯摇滚曲风的歌曲，也把老爸许冠杰经典之作《半斤八两》翻唱成ROCK版，而且组织、参加多场BAND SHOW之后，RAYN愈发觉得摇滚的形式感并不重要，精神才是摇滚的核心，SOLO有时候只是皮而已。这

entry.def: If you are tired, you feel that you want to rest or sleep.

example.ex: Michael is tired and he has to rest after his long trip.
example.tran: 迈克尔累了，他在长途旅行以后必须休息。

entry.tran: (身体部位)显出倦意的，感到疲乏的
entry.def: You can describe a part of your body as tired if it looks or feels as if you need to rest it or to sleep.

example.ex: Cucumber is good for soothing tired eyes…
example.tran: 黄瓜有助于舒缓眼部疲劳。

example.ex: My arms are tired, and my back is tense.
example.tran: 我的胳膊很累，背部肌肉紧绷得难受。

entry.def: If you are tired of something, you do not want it to continue because you are bored of it or unhappy with it.

example.ex: I am tired of all the speculation...
I was tired of being a bookkeeper.

entry.def: If you describe something as tired, you are critical of it because you have heard it or seen it many times.

example.ex: I didn't want to hear another one of his tired excuses...
example.tran: 我不想听他的又一个老掉牙的借口。

example.ex: What we see at Westminster is a tired old ritual.
example.tran: 我们在威斯敏斯特教堂看到的是一种经年不变的古旧仪式。

means.word_mean: 2. repeated too often; overfamiliar through overuse;

auth_sentence.content: Why do we go through life feeling this tired?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why do we go through life feeling this tired?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why do we go through life feeling this tired?

auth_sentence.content: One tired foolish statement wipes out weeks of work.
auth_sentence.res_content: One tired foolish statement wipes out weeks of work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One tired foolish statement wipes out weeks of work.

auth_sentence.content: Sadness can make you tired but for how long?
auth_sentence.res_content: Sadness can make you tired but for how long?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sadness can make you tired but for how long?

Sentence.sentence: He is tired of doing gardening on weekends.
According to Kalpit Shah, some students still use paper and pencil because they have get tired of reading on the iPad.
they have get tired of reading on the iPad.
Doctor, I haven't been able to get enough sleep lately, and I'm too tired to concentrate in class.

sentences.en: John was a tired man when he got back from the long journey.
sentences.cn: 约翰长途旅行后感到疲倦了。

sentences.en: She was too tired to continue.
sentences.cn: 她太疲劳无法继续下去。

sentences.en: I'm so tired that I could sleep for a week.
sentences.cn: 我真是累极了, 简直能睡上一个星期。

sentences.en: I'm tired of your stupid remarks.
The scripts had a rather tired plot.
sentences.cn: 这部陈旧的剧本的情节是非常俗套的。

jushi.english: “I'm hungry,” said the little boy in a tired voice.
jushi.chinese: “我饿了,”小男孩有气无力地说。

jushi.english: The scripts had a rather tired plot.
jushi.chinese: 这部陈旧的剧本的情节是非常俗套的。

jushi.english: He has a very tired face today.
